adversarial_findings.summary: artifact_index hash for day2 validator acceptance doc was stale versus on-disk bytes.
adversarial_findings.risk: Provenance checks may consume conflicting hashes and produce false trust.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Regenerate artifact_index hashes from final bytes and enforce index-hash consistency checks.

adversarial_findings.summary: Synthetic-generation guard evidence is weak because command log does not include adjudication artifact creation lineage.
adversarial_findings.risk: Post-hoc scripted artifact generation could evade intended manual-authorship control.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Require adjudication creation provenance lines or signed manual attestation in command log checks.

adversarial_findings.summary: Canonical output placeholders are marked not_run_day2 but could be misread as executed quality checks.
adversarial_findings.risk: Reviewers may misinterpret placeholders as executed regression evidence.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Mark placeholders as skipped-nonprimary or add validator rejection for placeholder primaries where pass semantics require execution.

adversarial_findings.summary: Queue rows were not advanced from pending to linked adjudication state after validation.
adversarial_findings.risk: Label chain-of-custody and dedupe become weaker for downstream export.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Update queue state with adjudication references after successful batch validation and artifact this update.

adversarial_findings.summary: Manual-quality entropy is low (identical adjudicated timestamps across all rows and templated hypothesis strings).
adversarial_findings.risk: Template-heavy labels can reduce learning robustness and obscure manual-quality drift.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Add quality heuristics (entropy/timestamp spread/template duplication thresholds) and manual exception path.

verified: validate_day_bundle.exit_code and validate_manual_adjudication_log.exit_code are 0 before red-team close.
adjudication batch and manual reasoning artifacts both contain 20 rows with exact row_id coverage.
